typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pbatch_id as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string,
		sync_status as string,
		account_type as string,
		sf_record_type as string,
		mailing_street as string,
		billing_street as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSFCompany
source(output(
		id as integer,
		StartBilledPeriod as timestamp,
		EndBilledPeriod as timestamp,
		IsMissingEstimated as string,
		Consumption as decimal(12,3),
		DaysIn12MonthPeriod as integer,
		PercentRecycled as decimal(12,3),
		ConsumptionIn12MonthPeriod as decimal(12,3),
		unique_meter_id as integer,
		batch_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookup
filterByBatchCompany alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Mailing_Country)||isNull(Billing_Country))) ~> alterByMailingBillingCountry
alterByMailingBillingCountry derive(DefaultMailingCountry = "Australia",
		DefaultBillingCountry = "Australia",
		id = id) ~> newColumns
getLookup filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterByBatch
getLookupSFCompany filter(equals(batch_id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterByBatchCompany
filterByBatch derive(D_IsMissingEstimated = iif(contains(IsMissingEstimated, 'yes'), 'Yes', 'No')) ~> transformedColumns
newColumns sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string,
		sync_status as string,
		account_type as string,
		sf_record_type as string,
		mailing_street as string,
		billing_street as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Mailing_Country = DefaultMailingCountry,
		Billing_Country = DefaultBillingCountry,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> updateLookupSFCmpany
transformedColumns sink(input(
		id as integer,
		billstable_id as integer,
		missing_or_estimated as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		billstable_id = id,
		missing_or_estimated = D_IsMissingEstimated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertIntoTransformed
